Text.Page: In time, our union will bring enlightenment to every corner of the world.
This place is for the enlightened. But in you, I sense great turmoil.
We can change the world. We can make it better!
While the others are content to perpetuate the struggle, the Enlightened Union strives for peace.
We can destroy this world with strife...or make it better, with understanding.
The Enlightened Union seeks only to bring harmony. How can this be seen as an act of aggression?
Great changes are about to take place. Will you join me in ensuring that those changes are for the good of all?
